full_summary:
### High Resolution, High Dynamic Range Digital Microscope Imaging System Tender

#### Tender Details

| Field | Field Value |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | PW-22-01009580 |
| Solicitation Number | 2023-00163 |
| Publication Date | October 7, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | November 16, 2022 13:00:00 |
| Procurement Category | Goods and Services - GD |
| Procurement Method | Competitive Selective Tendering |

#### Tender Description

Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of a High Resolution, High Dynamic Range Digital Microscope Imaging System (HR-HDR DMI). The estimated quantity of commodity is 1 unit. The estimated duration of the contract is 4 years, and the time frame of delivery is between November 15, 2022, and March 1, 2023.

#### Eligibility Requirements

Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is governed by the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

#### Regions of Opportunity

This tender is open to suppliers located in Canada.

#### Regions of Delivery

The delivery will be made to the Ontario province, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Contracting Entity

This tender is issued by the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA), with the contact information as follows:

* Nadege Muhimpundu - Nadege.Muhimpundu@inspection.gc.ca

#### Tender Documents

To download the tender package, please visit the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/07/f4e29a1c6506b12fa385bd5eb896e813/2023-00163-npp.pdf (English) or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/07/64144cb87e57264e635c0b88ffbb5352/2023-00163-apm.pdf (French).

#### Disclaimer

Please be aware that this tender is expired. It was originally published on October 7, 2022, and
